alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 11:38AM EST until December 24 at 11:40PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire and Maine... Pemigewasset River At Plymouth affecting Grafton and Belknap Counties. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Merrimack and Belknap Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Sagadahoc and Kennebec Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Maine and New Hampshire... Saco River At Conway affecting Carroll, Oxford, and Cumberland Counties. Piscataquog River NEAR Goffstown affecting Hillsborough County. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Warner River At Davisville affecting Merrimack County. For the Kennebec River...including Skowhegan, North Sidney, Augusta, Hallowell...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 35,000.0 cfs, Flooding begins at campgrounds in Skowhegan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Saturday the flow was 33,762.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 37,730.0 cfs this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 36,669.0 cfs on 04/27/2018. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
